Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hats, especially when you have bad hair days

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: My secret has always been to be true to myself

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: Some loved me, some hated me - but they all followed me

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: What could be a better recipe than mixing fashion and food?

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: Looking into the camera creates a special eye and soul contact

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, being Italian, I love pizza. Particularly from Naples. I am obsessed

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: I love white T-shirts as much as I love black. I often wear total black. It's my favourite

Quote.Author: Chiara Ferragni
Quote.QuoteValue: My favourite leather jackets are timeless

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes my heart sick when I remember all the good words and the broken promises

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat all men alike. Give them the same law. Give them an even chance to live and grow

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: The earth is the mother of all people, and all people should have equal rights upon it

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: It does not require many words to speak the truth

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: The Indian race are waiting and praying

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: We ask to be recognized as men

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: I will obey every law, or submit to the penalty

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: I have heard talk and talk, but nothing is done

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: Words do not pay for my dead people

Quote.Author: Chief Joseph
Quote.QuoteValue: Good words will not give me back my children

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not usually in a talkative mode

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: My brother brought home 'At San Quentin' when I was about 7, and we played it over and over again

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: There wasn't a key moment when I knew I wanted to quit

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day it's the fans who make you who you are

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: The focus on my wife and my children, it really helps me make sense of the music side of it somehow

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of music that I don't like

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: When Soundgarden formed, we were post-punk - pretty quirky

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: An acoustic show is all about you, and any little nuance or mistake is amplified

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually think to some degree that people are down for longer shows with an acoustic show

Quote.Author: Chris Cornell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really go mountain biking per se, like a proper sport

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I am single and not looking to be in a relationship

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I had no idea there were so many ways you could burn yourself out

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: If I do cardio I'll disappear

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: For the youth, the indignation of most things will just surge as each birthday passes

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that great with press sometimes

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: All my good movies, nobody sees

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I weep at everything. I love things so much - I just never want to dilute that

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I emote. I love things so much

Quote.Author: Chris Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love the sound of my dog snoring

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, life is about experience and being a good person

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes there is more exploration in the character for a villain

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Not often do you approach a character where people know more about him than you do

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: The more conflict and contrast you have with a character makes it more interesting

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: For three years, I had embarrassing haircuts

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I loved any fantasy

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Strong female leads are important

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, my parents were my heroes, in the way they conducted their lives

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a chatty kid

Quote.Author: Chris Hemsworth
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to explore things

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: My real big Internet claim to fame is the fact that I was first to jailbreak the iPhone

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I look up to a lot of people, but outside of my parents, I've never really had a mentor

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a person who feels compelled and then gets immersed

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn pretty fast that there is no magic solution to poverty

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: People are doing amazing things right now on the Web

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Many of us get our news from social networks, blogs, and daily aggregators

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can be ambitious

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: I was trying to figure out how to use the skills I had developed in the world of social change

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Buzz is not what I am looking for

Quote.Author: Chris Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Profit per se is not my motive

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I wanted to be either a rock star or a wrestler

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had an air of mystery

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been the type of guy that wants to change, adapt and morph from year to year

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'd ever be able to give up the spotlight

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I a workaholic? Yes, but I also have no problem taking time for myself

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want to hide my wrestling background

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always great to add to your legacy

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I never was an amateur wrestler

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I started playing music when I was 12 years old

Quote.Author: Chris Jericho
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really play a lot of games

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to slow your heart rate, stay calm. You have to shoot in between your heartbeats

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: But even before I was in the military, I was extremely jumpy when asleep

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: War is hell. Hollywood fantasizes about it and makes it look good... war sucks

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not a problem taking out someone who wants your people dead. That's not a problem at all

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't care what people think of me

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: The media cause more problems than they do good

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a fan of politics

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I kill someone, he can't plant an I.E.D. You don't think twice about it

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I like war

Quote.Author: Chris Kyle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just trying to get back to normal life

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Music comes from a place we don't know

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind not being cool

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't let love in, then you can't really give it back

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta wear the right trousers if you're gonna be a rock star

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: If a few companies were less greedy, the people at the bottom woud have a lot more

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't drink, I don't take drugs, I don't smoke

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: There comes a point where it doesn't matter how many zeroes are at the end of your bank account

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: More idiots should just shut their mouths

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal is to try and make the perfect song. Which of course will never happen

Quote.Author: Chris Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to make the best music of all time with my best friends

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: The authentic experience, where is that? Living the moment. That is something that we're losing

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of tragedy can befall us, but there's always something else; there's always hope

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing that I do find really sexy is a girl who's good at crossword puzzles

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: There are going to be good times and bad times, but lighten up

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: After many years of self-flagellation, I've realised that beating myself up doesn't get me anywhere

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: I do like dating cynics - they tend to be incredibly funny

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more cerebral than I want to be

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans have designated themselves the, uh, 'Pine Nuts.' They're a nutty bunch

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: Just lead your life and try to make the best decisions

Quote.Author: Chris Pine
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually just end up at home on my couch - reading

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be comfortable with who you are

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing funnier than a giant, grown man rollerblading

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be yourself and forget all of the stuff you read in 'GQ' magazine

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: You can pour melted ice cream on regular ice cream. It's like a sauce!

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite way to blow off steam is to sing obnoxiously loud in the shower

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I married way out of my pay grade. I have no idea how that happened

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I keep getting cast, I don't care if it's typecast

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a little soft. I like to eat

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to work with Steve Martin. I'd love to work with Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd

Quote.Author: Chris Pratt
Quote.QuoteValue: Television is such an evolving medium

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only offend me if you mean something to me

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Here's what I knew about doing a play: I knew it would make me a better actor

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to staying together is making sure you guys like each other and need each other

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in a neighborhood so bad that you can get shot while getting shot

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything you can suck at should make you nervous

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: No film critic's going to say it, but 'Madagascar 3' is better than 'The Artist.'

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: If you properly clean a room, it gets dirtier before it gets cleaner

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my best work is when I'm kind of in charge

Quote.Author: Chris Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an independent, but I got to admit I lean Democratic

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a hustler. I don't pitch songs. I don't ask people to write with me. It's not what I do

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I can only be me. I have a hard time being a chameleon as a singer

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tell people, 'The music's free. I get paid to travel.'

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, I just have to do what I do and let it be what it's gonna be

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Country music is one of those places where we support each other and prop each other up

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad was a very straight arrow, prayed-at-every-meal kind of guy

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is not a game to me. I take it very seriously

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as people are buying music, it's good for everybody

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been in touring bands in some capacity

Quote.Author: Chris Stapleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a car salesman, if you can believe it

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: So much of the mainstream media has taught us what beauty is, but everyone is beautiful

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: If I find a cute skirt, I'm not fixated on a brand

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm on this journey to inspire people and to encourage them

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't love who you are now, you can't get to the place you want to be

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to have a man in my life, and I think men are attracted to that

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day... my love for my body... comes from within

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat my feelings - when I'm happy, when I'm sad

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: I do want to lose weight. But not because anyone is telling me to do it

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: If I ever end up on the worst-dressed list, it's not going to make me fall apart

Quote.Author: Chrissy Metz
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to use what you know to make a part real

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I think trying too hard to be sexy is the worst thing in the world a woman can do

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: In everyday life, my wife is the most wonderful. We're in love with each other beyond belief

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: How serious can a movie about time-traveling robots be? You want it to be cool and fun

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not who I am underneath but what I do that defines me

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a fear of being boring

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm like any of the characters I've played - they're all really far from who I am

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I only sound intelligent when there's a good script writer around

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: If everyone really knew what a jerk I am in real life, I wouldn't be so adored in the slightest

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't personally look to my own life experiences for answers about how to play a scene

Quote.Author: Christian Bale
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want to feel that I'm playing it safe

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep in every heart slumbers a dream, and the couturier knows it: every woman is a princess

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: The tones of gray, pale turquoise and pink will prevail

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: Without foundations, there can be no fashion

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's perfume tells more about her than her handwriting

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: A country, a style or an epoch are interesting only for the idea behind them

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream is to save women from nature

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: In a machine age, dressmaking is one of the last refuges of the human, the personal, the inimitable

Quote.Author: Christian Dior
Quote.QuoteValue: The detail is as important as the essential is. When it is inadequate, it destroys the whole outfit

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: A shoe has so much more to offer than just to walk

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman can be sexy, charming, witty or shy with her shoes

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: Strangely enough, I really think that shoes are a communication tool between people

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman carries her clothes. But the shoe carries the woman

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: High heels are pleasure with pain

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: There are few plants that are ugly. It's how you use them that may not be pretty

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: High heels empower women in a way

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my customer to be fierce

Quote.Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote.QuoteValue: People are proud of their tattoos. It's like a modern coat of arms

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: I've calmed down, certainly, from the days of being 18, but I'm still having a good time

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: Good judgement comes from experience. Sometimes, experience comes from bad judgement

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: How do I feel about being a star now? Well I still try to live life and enjoy what I am doing

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: There was a time when I felt I should do everything that was offered to me, you know, ride the wave

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: Jail was a result of me not taking time for myself. So I was forced to take some time for myself

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: Strike and struggle precede success, even in the dictionary

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a gypsy, in a way. It's a condition of my profession

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: Having kids certainly gets me to ask the question, 'Who is the adult here, and who is the kid?'

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always a leap of faith when you get involved with somebody

Quote.Author: Christian Slater
Quote.QuoteValue: I can promote until I am blue in the face, but ultimately nobody knows what makes a hit

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I just found out that I'm one inch taller than I thought

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to not have oysters and champagne sometimes

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is like an instant facelift and an instant mood lift

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you give, the more you get - it's a cliche, but it's really true

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish my butt did not go sideways, but I guess I have to face that

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short. Ricky and I realize how lucky we were. We want to be together all the time

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest deterrent to getting the workout I need is just that my days are so full and so busy

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: When you feel good, you look good. And vice versa: When you look good, you feel good

Quote.Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile. It instantly lifts the face, and it just lights up the room

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a night owl because that's when I feel the most creative and alive

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: Red lips and fragrance always top off an outfit for me

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an ocean, because I'm really deep. If you search deep enough you can find rare exotic treasures

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been one to encourage perseverance

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a judgmental person, so I can't comment on someone else's background

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: I do reinvent old hits of mine and sort of give them a new life

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: So, where's the Cannes Film Festival being held this year?

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: The roughest road often leads to the top

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: Pop is actually my least favorite kind of music, because it lacks real depth

Quote.Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote.QuoteValue: Right now I'm pretty single... My career is my boyfriend

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I am also a hard worker and people are sometimes surprised to see that as well

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: For one year I did go to Performing Arts School, and I had very weird friends

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, I'm Violet's mom, and I want the best for her

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: But people who do not know me are surprised to see me as a real person I guess

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to never give up and to be fearless. That's what I have

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a grown woman. The haters are definitely wrong if they think I care

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I've teamed up with Pine Sol to celebrate the makers of home

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I sang the 'Kim Possible' song for their cartoon series 'Kim Possible'

Quote.Author: Christina Milian
Quote.QuoteValue: I go in full with my heart

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I would never be cast as the pretty girl

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the way my own feet smell. I love to smell my sneakers when I take them off

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I went through an awkward adolescence and had braces

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: This is my costume. I'm a homicidal maniac. They look just like everyone else

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole growing-up process seems to have eluded me

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew that I was kind of bored; the regular life of a child didn't fit me

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything, I think, about acting is based on imagination

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a TV addict, and I personally really enjoy reality TV

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to just go with the flow and learn from the people around me

Quote.Author: Christina Ricci
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a big sci-fi fantasy geek when I was younger... secretly, in my room

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a better Chris Quinn. I don't want to be a different Chris Quinn

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not about talking and finger-pointing and complaining. I'm about getting things done

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: We all think people deserve second chances. None of us are perfect

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: To get things done, you have to get people together

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in a position where, if you have the ability, you should use it well. To get things done

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: At times, you need to be forceful to get things that are stuck unstuck

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: Consensus doesn't happen by magic... You have to drive to it

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a tendency toward being a micromanager

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: 'No one sits Baby in a corner,' one of the best lines in movie history

Quote.Author: Christine Quinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't be more proud of my work as a progressive

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The effect of the mass media is not to elicit belief but to maintain the apparatus of addiction

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people no longer live in nuclear families at all

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: Personal disintegration remains always an imminent danger

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: Environmentalism opposes reckless innovation and makes conservation the central order of business

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The left ask people to believe that there is no conflict between feminism and the family

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The model of ownership, in a society organized round mass consumption, is addiction

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The reporting of news has to be understood as propaganda for commodities, and events by images

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all revolutionaries now, addicts of change

Quote.Author: Christopher Lasch
Quote.QuoteValue: The job of the press is to encourage debate, not to supply the public with information

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I associate heavy metal with fantasy because of the tremendous power that the music delivers

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Wicker Man' for me, as an actor, was definitely the best film I've ever done

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I did play Ramses II once, who lived to be 91 and had 120 children, but he died 4,000 years ago

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a legend, you've either got to be dead or excessively old!

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I turn to the 'Telegraph's' obituaries page with trepidation

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many vampires in the world today... you only have to think of the film business

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done a lot of films that have become iconic, not necessarily because of me

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: A whole new career opened up for me when I was in 'Lord Of The Rings' and 'Star Wars.'

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is the most difficult thing to do. Easily the most difficult

Quote.Author: Christopher Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had any deadly secrets, I wouldn't still be alive

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: That perfect bliss and sole felicity, the sweet fruition of an earthly crown

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: What feeds me destroys me
